summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 19th Avenue Southwest, 20th Avenue Southwest and 21st Avenue Southwest, each from West Genesee Street to the north line of White Brothers Addition, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers together with the necessary appurtenances; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8100 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
